about_the_game:
Welcome to Seven Cities, the urban action RPG set in a near-future New York City. In a world divided by corporate greed and technological advancement, you, an Outsider, must rise to reclaim the city and restore unity among its inhabitants. Prepare to experience a dynamic blend of modern urban environments, intense combat, and deep character customization.

Key Features:

Customization and Gameplay:


  • Weapon Specializations: Choose from hundreds of weapon specializations to create a unique and devastating arsenal.
  • Tech Skills: Use technology-based skills to dominate your enemies, with holographic attacks and hacking abilities.
  • Robot Companion: Equip and customize your faithful robot with active and passive abilities to assist you in your mission.

Exploration and Immersion:


  • A Living World: Explore varied urban environments, from dark alleys to shimmering skyscrapers, each with its own challenges and secrets.
  • Quests and Missions: Take on epic challenges, battle imposing bosses, and uncover the truth behind the division of the Seven Cities.
  • Holograms and Digital Realities: Immerse yourself in a world where reality blends with simulation through stunning visual effects.

Prepare for an Epic Adventure:

  • Regular Updates: Enjoy frequent updates with new weapons, skills, missions, and more.
  • Early Access: Be among the first to play and shape the future of Seven Cities by participating in our early access in october.

Multiplayer and Community:

  • Online Co-op: Team up with friends or join other players to tackle the challenges of the Seven Cities together. (We are actively working on the multiplayer that should be available during 2025)
  • Seasonal Events: Participate in regular events and unlock exclusive content throughout the year.
  • Community Support: Join our Discord to share feedback, discuss strategies, and stay updated with the latest game news.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content
